messages.text:
Hi! I'm Video Agent, here to help you create awesome videos with ArenaGen. Here's my proposed plan for your demo video:

Topic	A short demo showcasing ArenaGen's Video Agent capabilities, with the avatar introducing herself and simple features.
Audience	General users new to ArenaGen.
Music Theme	Upbeat and modern electronic.
Video Length	Roughly 15 seconds (short-form demo).
Video Orientation	Portrait.
Script Plan	The script will be automatically generated based on the topic, featuring a friendly intro like "Hi, I'm [avatar], powered by ArenaGen's Video Agent—let's create amazing videos together!"
Target Language	English (United States).
Avatar	
Sunny Smile
 (female).
Voice	The voice of the provided avatar.
Supplemental Footage (B-roll)	No B-roll (focus on avatar).
Captions	Enabled.

Would you like to proceed with this plan? Type Yes to continue with this plan.
Your demo video has been generated successfully—check it out above! What would you like to do next: edit it, make a new one, or something else?
